page.title: 06Law and Order
page.content: There is one police station in our area with eight policemen and one sergeant. They cover Newport on Tay section by car in case of emergencies. The most common crime committed is malicious mischief. The police deal with this as well as licences, sheep dipping, dead bodies etc.. Car crashes occur quite often because of the A914 nearby. Unfortunately, policemen can't teach children road safety, as they can't say for certain whether they would be able to attend reglarly. There are no special squads but the air base at Leuchars is near our area with emergency air-sea rescue equipment at hand.
